title: Paytm shares tumble 4% after ED issues show cause notice over alleged FEMA violations
content: Shares of One 97 Communications (OCL), the parent company of Paytm, tumbled by 4.4% to their days low of Rs 685 on the BSE on Monday after the Enforcement Directorate (ED) issued a show cause notice â€¦ [+2448 chars]
